languages.text: "Амик'Соломон был не прав: Домин стоит выше закона, ибо исполняет волю Неумирающего. Потому Он и прошептал имя слуги своего".

traits.locale_text: "Амик'Соломон был не прав: Домин стоит выше закона, ибо исполняет волю Неумирающего. Потому Он и прошептал имя слуги своего".

languages.text: "Amic'Solomorne was wrong. The Domin stands above the law, for {mf|he|she} is the extension of the Undying One's will. That is why He whispered the name of His servant."
languages.original_text: "Амик'Соломон был не прав: Домин стоит выше закона, ибо исполняет волю Неумирающего. Потому Он и прошептал имя слуги своего".

traits.locale_text: "Amic'Solomorne was wrong. The Domin stands above the law, for {mf|he|she} is the extension of the Undying One's will. That is why He whispered the name of His servant."
"Amic'Solomorne was wrong. The Domin stands above the law, for {mf|he|she} is the extension of the Undying One's will. That is why He whispered the name of His servant."

"Amic'Solomorne was wrong. The Domin stands above the law, for {mf|he|she} is the extension of the Undying One's will. That is why He whispered the name of His servant."

languages.text: 「ソロモーンは間違っていた。ドミンは法を超越している。なぜならあの方は、不死の者の意志の延長だからだ。だからこそ、陛下はそのしもべの名を囁かれたのだ」
languages.original_text: "Amic'Solomorne was wrong. The Domin stands above the law, for {mf|he|she} is the extension of the Undying One's will. That is why He whispered the name of His servant."

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーンは間違っていた。ドミンは法を超越している。なぜならあの方は、不死の者の意志の延長だからだ。だからこそ、陛下はそのしもべの名を囁かれたのだ」

languages.text: "Amic'Solomorne lag falsch. {mf|Der|Die} Domin steht über dem Gesetz, denn {mf|er|sie} ist die Erweiterung des Willens des Todlosen. Darum hat Er den Namen Seines Dieners geflüstert."
languages.original_text: "Amic'Solomorne was wrong. The Domin stands above the law, for {mf|he|she} is the extension of the Undying One's will. That is why He whispered the name of His servant."

traits.locale_text: "Amic'Solomorne lag falsch. {mf|Der|Die} Domin steht über dem Gesetz, denn {mf|er|sie} ist die Erweiterung des Willens des Todlosen. Darum hat Er den Namen Seines Dieners geflüstert."

languages.text: « Amic'Solomorne a eu tort. {mf|Le|La} Domin est au-dessus des lois, car {mf|il|elle} est l'extension de la volonté de l'Immortel. C'est pour cette raison qu'Il a murmuré le nom de {mf|son serviteur|sa servante}. »
languages.original_text: "Amic'Solomorne was wrong. The Domin stands above the law, for {mf|he|she} is the extension of the Undying One's will. That is why He whispered the name of His servant."

traits.locale_text: « Amic'Solomorne a eu tort. {mf|Le|La} Domin est au-dessus des lois, car {mf|il|elle} est l'extension de la volonté de l'Immortel. C'est pour cette raison qu'Il a murmuré le nom de {mf|son serviteur|sa servante}. »

languages.text: «Amic'Solomorne se equivocó. {mf|El|La} Domin está por encima de la ley, ya que es una extensión de la voluntad del Inmortal. Por eso Él susurró el nombre de Su siervo».
languages.original_text: "Amic'Solomorne was wrong. The Domin stands above the law, for {mf|he|she} is the extension of the Undying One's will. That is why He whispered the name of His servant."

traits.locale_text: «Amic'Solomorne se equivocó. {mf|El|La} Domin está por encima de la ley, ya que es una extensión de la voluntad del Inmortal. Por eso Él susurró el nombre de Su siervo».

languages.text: “信者索罗蒙错了。秘者有权凌驾于律法之上，因为{mf|他|她}是不死之神意志的延伸，正因如此，祂低声呼唤了祂仆人的名字。”
languages.original_text: "Amic'Solomorne was wrong. The Domin stands above the law, for {mf|he|she} is the extension of the Undying One's will. That is why He whispered the name of His servant."

traits.locale_text: “信者索罗蒙错了。秘者有权凌驾于律法之上，因为{mf|他|她}是不死之神意志的延伸，正因如此，祂低声呼唤了祂仆人的名字。”

languages.text: "Amik'Solomorne hatalıydı. Domin, kanunlardan üstündür. O ki Ölmeyen'in arzusunun temsilcisidir. O'nun hizmetkârının adını fısıldaması da bu yüzden."
languages.original_text: "Amic'Solomorne was wrong. The Domin stands above the law, for {mf|he|she} is the extension of the Undying One's will. That is why He whispered the name of His servant."

traits.locale_text: "Amik Solomorne hatalıydı. Domin kanunlardan üstündür, o ki Ölmeyen'in arzusunun temsilcisidir. O'nun Hizmetkârının adını fısıldaması da bu yüzden."

languages.original_text: "Amic'Solomorne was wrong. The Domin stands above the law, for {mf|he|she} is the extension of the Undying One's will. That is why He whispered the name of His servant."
